aircraft.value: Harrier Stealth - AC-8368-224 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Composite panel delamination. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 14/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 15/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 15/07/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 19/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/07/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
